title: Portfolio 2.0 - My New Portfolio/Blog Site
description: This will be the last project updated for this portfolio site. I'll keep it up just in case people access it from my old resume.

title: breadsauce.us - Wedding Site
description: Here, I get to show off my animation skills as well as try new tech like the Vite bundler. Vite is ridiculously fast compared to webpack.

title: skyskill.tech - Project Skill Trees
description: An MVP of an SPA where teachers can create skill trees for students. The application is not complete. In the complete version, teachers would be able receive feedback from their students about how confident they feel about a topic, among many other features. When it comes to making education more student-centered, I believe a step in the right direction is to make it a more fun game to play through the use of skill trees.

title: semblance.us
description: The purpose of this project was to encourage people to meet others locally, in-person through the gamification of story archetypes and narrative choices. Although I learned a lot, I am no longer interested in completing this project.

title: Smiling School
description: This is a project for school in which students were tasked with replicating a website designed in Figma and were later asked to add simple functionality.

title: Frontend School Projects
description: This repository contains various frontend projects completed for school.

title: Backend School Projects
description: This repository contains various backend projects completed for school.

title: Gates of Shell
description: This is a project for school in which students were tasked with coding a simple unix shell in the C programming language. All functions were made from scratch with a box of scraps.

title: Stock Trading Bot
description: Fun challenge. If you're a developer, I feel like you need to have tried this once.

title: Simple Lead Generator
description: The purpose of this script is to provide a GUI for scraping emails, phone numbers, and contact urls from the top result of duckduckgo from a list of business names in an excel sheet.

title: This Website!
description: The main purpose of this website is to market myself to potential employers.
